title: Marvel Adventures - Avengers
description:
In 2006, Marvel Adventures (Marvel Comics&#039; "All Ages" line) began a new Avengers series, featuring a line-up of Captain America, Iron Man, Spider-Man (supplanting Ant-Man), Wolverine, Storm, the Hulk and Giant-Girl (Janet van Dyne, the Wasp in regular continuity). Recent issues have referred to Storm as the co-leader of the team. The series takes place in its own continuity, as with most of the other titles in the Marvel Adventures line.

Support your comic industry, to insure your favorite books can continue!
